short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A GUI client for local SQLite databases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A web based GUI client for SQLite.

Features:
  Manage any SQLite database on your computer
  Edit and run SQL queries with full syntax highlighting support
  Browse and search the tables, as well as add, edit and delete records
  Helpful views to manage tables, indexes, views and triggers
  Preview blob images inline
  Import and export tables or DB as SQL file
